title: Hour 3 – David Vassegh (07-06-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 – David Vassegh (07-06-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb are in for Dan and the Danettes, and they debate the safety of returning to live sports with confirmed cases of the coronavirus on the rise. MLB Insider David Vassegh joins the show to talk about David Price’s decision not play baseball in 2020 and share some insight on the new protocols in place. They also discuss President Trump’s latest twitter rant targeting NASCAR and Bubba Wallace.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
